sections.heading: 01|Bottled beverage tax definitions
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1982Latest Legislation:House Bill 357 - 114th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections4307.01to4307.12of the Revised Code:(A) "Beer" and "beverages" have the same meaning as given in division (B)(2) of section4301.01of
